claim_extraction.claim: Climate change has caused a 20% decline in global crop yields over the past decade
claim_extraction.canonicalized_claim: Global crop yields have declined by 20% due to climate change in the last 10 years
suggested_queries: climate change impact on agriculture IPCC

passages.reason: IPCC report confirms climate change affects agricultural productivity with regional declines
FAO data shows global yields increased 2-3% per decade despite climate pressures
Technological improvements have offset many climate change impacts on yields

reasoning_bullets: Strong contradictory evidence from FAO showing yield increases despite climate change
IPCC acknowledges regional impacts but global yields have risen due to technology
Claim overstates climate impact by ignoring adaptation and technological factors
